author: corcoranwill
content: <@1386598056320831509> were you able to join the 7732 call to pitch your Builder API hackMD?

author: potuz
content: Depending on the type it may be easier to enforce that the self building signature is the point at infinity like for sync committee rather than zero

author: potuz
content:
Also for clarity, for devnet zero are these other changes agreed? 
- ignore payloads and sidecars if you haven't seen the block
- rename the header to bid
- remove Merkle proofs and headers from sidecars

author: terencechain
content: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4552 <@755590043632140352> <@554799849288105986> <@504202741933932544> does this look good to you guys?

author: terencechain
content:
can we also add these two?
- no zero value withdrawals
- consider builder pending payments for pending balance to withdraw

author: potuz
content: My desktop died as I was reviewing so I'll leave this here on the cell. Signature verification is better to happen earlier than the active status of the validator. Which is good anyway, you can also skip this check for the self building proposer

author: potuz
content: Because it's checked on the beacon block anyway

author: terencechain
content: thanks, I also just pushed a commit, I shouldn't have added that to p2p spec because p2p bid must come from 0x03 validator anyway

author: terencechain
content: no, none of those are merged

author: terencechain
content: just pushed a commit to move signature check to *before* active check

author: tbenr
content: the current version looks good to me

author: tbenr
content: it is also good that now the address type check happens before the signature verification (that check supposed to be cheaper)

author: ethdreamer
content: Check the p2p specs because I think they have something about asserting the payload signature is valid

author: terencechain
content:
you mean bid signature right? not payload. I originally added but realized bid p2p only accepts 0x03 validator so i don't think we need any change there
```
[REJECT] the builder's withdrawal credentials' prefix is BUILDER_WITHDRAWAL_PREFIX -- i.e. is_builder_withdrawal_credential(state.validators[header.builder_index].withdrawal_credentials) returns True.
```
